repos.name: graphql
repos.description: A secure, data-driven profile page built with GraphQL and JWT authentication. It allows Zone01 users to log in safely, fetch personalized data, and view their statistics visualized through interactive SVG charts.

repos.name: Oncure
repos.description: A social support network for cancer patients, survivors, caregivers, and health coaches onCare blends community connection, mentorship, and blockchain-powered rewards (via Hedera) to create a safe, stigma-free, and motivating environment for healing and resilience.

repos.name: campus_student_course-lecturer_review_analysis
repos.description: An end-to-end Python toolkit that cleans student survey data, standardizes lecturer/course names, computes sentiment and satisfaction scores, and produces exportable reports (PDF/Word) and visual dashboards.

repos.name: ETHiopia-Builder-Journal
repos.description: A personal blog documenting my experience during the Ethiopia Builder Residency, where I explored innovative solutions, collaborated with fellow builders, and reflected on challenges and learnings from the program.

repos.name: system_monitor
repos.description: A desktop system monitor built in Rust using Dear ImGui for the user interface. This application displays live information on CPU, memory, processes, thermal state, fan performance, and network activity by leveraging the Linux /proc filesystem.

repos.name: formy
repos.description: Formy is an innovative solution designed to streamline the judging process for form-based challenges and competitions. It eliminates the manual work involved in reviewing submissions and recording judge feedback.

repos.name: moviebarn
repos.description: A movie/TV discovery web app that allows users to search and explore detailed information on entertainment content using TMDB and OMDB APIs. Users can manage personal watchlists, discover trending and recommended titles, and filter content by genre and popularity.

repos.name: imageConvertor
repos.description: A utility program that transforms images into grayscale and ASCII art, saving the processed grayscale image and the ASCII art output as separate files for visual and text-based representation.

repos.name: go-reloaded
repos.description: A simple, user-friendly tool designed to complete, edit, and auto-correct text in a file

repos.description: This project is focused on applying Go (Golang) to solve mathematical problems, particularly in the context of cryptography, number theory, and algorithmic computation.

repos.description: ENS Asset Sender is a lightweight backend service that enables seamless transfers of ETH and tokens to Ethereum Name Service (ENS) names, Base names, or standard Ethereum wallet addresses.

repos.name: litterFreeKenya
repos.description: LitterFreeKenya is a conservation-focused website dedicated to protecting natural habitats, safeguarding endangered species, and promoting sustainability through education, community involvement, and environmental advocacy.

repos.name: Imara-Platform
repos.description: IMARA is a blockchain-native collaboration platform that uses staking as a commitment mechanism to connect serious builders worldwide, ensuring that only dedicated and accountable contributors participate in projects.

repos.name: system_monitoring
repos.description: A desktop system monitor built in C++ using Dear ImGui for the user interface. This application displays live information on CPU, memory, processes, thermal state, fan performance, and network activity by leveraging the Linux /proc filesystem.

repos.name: learning_kubernetes
repos.description: A reference for commonly used Kubernetes commands, including how to work with Minikube and kubectl.

repos.name: chetupamoja
repos.description: ChetuPamoja is a simple, secure crypto donation platform designed for Kenyan organizations. It works alongside existing channels like MPESA, making it easy for organizations to accept crypto without technical barriers.

repos.name: taskup
repos.description: A token-rewarded accountability app built on Base Minikit that helps users complete tasks through buddy verification and social incentives. Users can optionally stake money to double their token rewards, creating stronger commitment mechanisms.

repos.name: eauti
repos.description: A content subscription platform that enables creators to monetize their work directly through on-chain crypto payments. It ensures that creators receive the full value of their content, eliminating intermediaries, high fees, and delayed payouts.

repos.name: linkedIn-bot
repos.description: A Go-based LinkedIn automation bot that allows you to post text updates, articles, and images to LinkedIn using the LinkedIn API.

repos.name: winzzers
repos.description: A trustless peer-to-peer (P2P) sports betting platform enabling users to directly create and accept sports bets with one another, without intermediaries. All bets are executed and settled via secure smart contracts, ensuring transparency, fairness, and instant payouts on-chain.

repos.name: missionaries
repos.description: A React-based web app that lets attendees of the Ethereum@10 Kisumu event (July 30, 2025) quickly create beautiful, shareable, and print-ready personalized attendance posters. Users enter their name and photo the app applies one of several curated templates, produces a high-resolution poster (PNG/PDF/SVG), and provides download option

repos.name: donation_website
repos.description: Donation Platform - Project Description  A simple web application that enables anonymous donations to social projects using Mpesa payments, with an administrative dashboard for project management.

repos.name: labourer
